name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Drop n Mark - Drag & Drop Bookmarker

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use drag and drop to create / delete bookmarks and folders.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Current methods of bookmarking suck, using this extension you will be bookmarking more frequently and your bookmarks will be better categorized thus easier to find; bookmarking will be effortless and no longer suck.

Drag n Drop works well when used along side other bookmark managers, where a bookmark manager will help you find and manage existing bookmarks and Drag n Drop will make bookmarking effortless.

Drag n Drop can be configured via options found when right clicking the extension when pinned. In options you can adjust where new bookmarks are saved, enable automatic deletion of duplicates and/or enable automatic organization of your files & folders.

Features:
- Drag & Drop to bookmark current page
- Drag & Drop to create new folder
- Automatic deletion of duplicate bookmarks
- Automatic organization of files & folders
- Works along side other bookmark managers 
- Does not suck

Help improve this extension by suggesting new features or reporting any bugs.
